title: The Talos Principle: Road to Gehenna3 (DLC + MULTI13) [FitGirl
description:
::Information::


Release Date: July 23, 2015
Genres/Tags: Puzzle, 3D, First-person
Developer: CroTeam
Publisher: Devolver Digital
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Serious Engine
Steam User Rating - TTP: 97% of user reviews are positive (based on 3,133 reviews)
Steam User Rating - RtG: 96% of user reviews are positive (based on 108 reviews)
Interface Language of TTP: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Croatian
Audio Language of TTP: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
Interface Language of RtG: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian
Audio Language of RtG: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian
Crack: included (RELOADED)


::Repack Features::


Based on The.Talos.Principle.Road.To.Gehenna-RELOADED ISO release: rld-gehenna.iso (11,591,974,912 bytes)
The.Talos.Principle.Update.v244371-BAT (1.6 GB) installed over
Repack includes original game, patched to v244371 + DLCs: Prototype, Serious DLC & Road to Gehenna
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
Bonus Content (soundtrack, wallpapers, posters, etc.) included
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Ability to skip downloading & installing bonus content pack
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10.8/12.4 to 4.9/5 GB)
You can combine UI and audio languages in the game options as you like
Installation takes 20-50 minutes (depending on number of CPU cores & HDD load)
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
On some PCs game can be launched only via BinTalos_Unrestricted.exe
HDD space after installation: 9 GB (~24 Gb during installation)
Repack by FitGirl
